questionTitle: They ________ last weekend .
I'm no good ________ mathematics
I don't need ________ to help me.
Aeroplanes ________ and land every minute.
I ________ a lot of work to do today.
I'd like ________ you tomorrow morning.

She always ________ to her friend when she is abroad .
If Muriel had come, she would have won. = ________
anwers: If she hadn't won, she'd have come.
Muriel didn't win because she didn't come.
When Muriel came she always won.
She didn't come, but she won anyway.
